body:
## Previously on this day:

- [2016](https://buttondown.email/justinwolfe/archive/thank-you-notesesme3/) (from **esmé**) (_not having cancer_)
- 2016 ([2](https://buttondown.email/justinwolfe/archive/thank-you-notes-48/)) (_the chicago manual of style, listened to death grips while i worked on my citations, comparison to the paul rust character on Love_)
- 2016 ([3](https://buttondown.email/justinwolfe/archive/thank-you-notes-tj/)) (from **tj**) (_this new job and the amount of writing i get to do every day, motion-sensitive light in my office, someone i care for has come back into my life_)
- [2017](https://buttondown.email/justinwolfe/archive/moe13/) (from **moe**) (_when he asked how i was really doing, i paused, thought about it, and when i was about to say okay laughed instead; to give my friends space to be human; because i have bipolar disorder when i start to downslide, it is remarkably obvious to everyone around me_)
- [2018](https://buttondown.email/justinwolfe/archive/48-8835/) (_leftover chinese takeout_)
- [2020](https://buttondown.email/justinwolfe/archive/lawnmower-man/) (_buying a lawnmower, thursday when it is going to get above seventy in the evening, looking at the stars with deborah_)
normalized_markdown:
## Previously on this day:

- [2016](https://buttondown.email/justinwolfe/archive/thank-you-notesesme3/) (from **esmé**) (_not having cancer_)
- 2016 ([2](https://buttondown.email/justinwolfe/archive/thank-you-notes-48/)) (_the chicago manual of style, listened to death grips while i worked on my citations, comparison to the paul rust character on Love_)
- 2016 ([3](https://buttondown.email/justinwolfe/archive/thank-you-notes-tj/)) (from **tj**) (_this new job and the amount of writing i get to do every day, motion-sensitive light in my office, someone i care for has come back into my life_)
- [2017](https://buttondown.email/justinwolfe/archive/moe13/) (from **moe**) (_when he asked how i was really doing, i paused, thought about it, and when i was about to say okay laughed instead; to give my friends space to be human; because i have bipolar disorder when i start to downslide, it is remarkably obvious to everyone around me_)
- [2018](https://buttondown.email/justinwolfe/archive/48-8835/) (_leftover chinese takeout_)
- [2020](https://buttondown.email/justinwolfe/archive/lawnmower-man/) (_buying a lawnmower, thursday when it is going to get above seventy in the evening, looking at the stars with deborah_)
